title: with parameter "ssr: false" in hooks and layout.server.ts file on root, app reloads non-stop
body:
### Describe the bug

with parameter "ssr: false" in hooks and layout.server.ts file on root, app reloads non-stop.

```JS
// hooks.ts
	const response = await resolve(event, {
		ssr: false
	});
```

if I change ssr: true, the reload stops.

Also, when accessing urls with "__data.js", handle is fired on hooks.ts. 


### Reproduction

https://stackblitz.com/edit/sveltejs-kit-template-default-m6nxzj?file=src/hooks.ts
